author: chfast
content:
What name is "the most correct" to refer precompiled contracts?
- precompile / precompiles
- precompiled / (no plular)

author: jlokier
content: The Yellow Paper uses "precompiled contract(s)" in many places consistently, except "precompile" in one place (perhaps it should be edited), and "precompiled addresses" in another. EIP-152 uses "precompile" in its title but "precompiled contract" in its body.

author: jlokier
content: So in a specification I would roll with "precompiled contracts".

author: chfast
content: Make sense in this context, but I want shorter term in code.

author: jlokier
content: In code I would use "precompile" / "precompiles", and in this case I'm confident anyone working with EVM/EVMC will know what that means.
